pastInspirations.q: Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You'll find they haven't half the strength you think they have.
pastInspirations.h:
“Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You'll find they haven't half the strength you think they have.” —
Norman Vincent Peale

pastInspirations.q: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
pastInspirations.h:
“All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

pastInspirations.q: People don't realize that now is all there ever is; there is no past or future except as memory or anticipation in your mind.
pastInspirations.h:
“People don't realize that now is all there ever is; there is no past or future except as memory or anticipation in your mind.” —
Eckhart Tolle

pastInspirations.q: If you truly love Nature, you will find beauty everywhere.
pastInspirations.h:
“If you truly love Nature, you will find beauty everywhere. ” —
Vincent van Gogh

pastInspirations.q: A Hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
pastInspirations.h:
“A Hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.” —
Christopher Reeve

pastInspirations.q: The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.
pastInspirations.h:
“The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.” —
James Allen

pastInspirations.q: A scientific man ought to have no wishes, no affections, - a mere heart of stone.
pastInspirations.h:
“A scientific man ought to have no wishes, no affections, - a mere heart of stone.” —
Charles Darwin

pastInspirations.q: We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
pastInspirations.h:
“We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.” —
George Bernard Shaw

pastInspirations.q: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
pastInspirations.h:
“To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.” —
Pema Chodron

pastInspirations.q: The wisest men follow their own direction.
pastInspirations.h:
“The wisest men follow their own direction.” —
Euripides

pastInspirations.q: Show me a hero, and I'll write you a tragedy.
pastInspirations.h:
“Show me a hero, and I'll write you a tragedy.” —
F. Scott Fitzgerald

pastInspirations.q: Loss is nothing else but change and change is nature's delight.
pastInspirations.h:
“Loss is nothing else but change and change is nature's delight.” —
Marcus Aurelius

pastInspirations.q: Great ones are willing to get burned time and again as they sharpen their swords in the fire.
pastInspirations.h:
“Great ones are willing to get burned time and again as they sharpen their swords in the fire.” —
Josh Waitzkin

pastInspirations.q: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
pastInspirations.h:
“Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.” —
Zig Ziglar

pastInspirations.q: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
pastInspirations.h:
“The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering. ” —
Bruce Lee

pastInspirations.q: Constantly think about how you could be doing things better.
pastInspirations.h:
“Constantly think about how you could be doing things better.” —
Elon Musk

pastInspirations.q: Tradition is the illusion of permanence.
pastInspirations.h:
“Tradition is the illusion of permanence. ” —
Woody Allen

pastInspirations.q: Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them.
pastInspirations.h:
“Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them.” —
A.A. Milne

pastInspirations.q: The salvation of the world lies in the human heart.
pastInspirations.h:
“The salvation of the world lies in the human heart.” —
Vaclav Havel

pastInspirations.q: We build too many walls and not enough bridges.
pastInspirations.h:
“We build too many walls and not enough bridges.” —
Isaac Newton

pastInspirations.q: Boldness makes even the smallest animal dangerous.
pastInspirations.h:
“Boldness makes even the smallest animal dangerous.” —
Robert Greene

pastInspirations.q: The things I carry are my thoughts. That's it. They are the only weight. My thoughts determine whether I am free and light or burdened.
pastInspirations.h:
“The things I carry are my thoughts. That's it. They are the only weight. My thoughts determine whether I am free and light or burdened.” —
Kamal Ravikant

pastInspirations.q: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
pastInspirations.h:
“True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.” —
Socrates

pastInspirations.q: The foolish reject what they see, not what they think; the wise reject what they think, not what they see.
pastInspirations.h:
“The foolish reject what they see, not what they think; the wise reject what they think, not what they see.” —
Huang Po

pastInspirations.q: Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.
pastInspirations.h:
“Behind every beautiful thing, there's some kind of pain.” —
Bob Dylan

pastInspirations.q: What's obvious to you isn't obvious to most people. Operate from this perspective and you'll help more people.
pastInspirations.h:
“What's obvious to you isn't obvious to most people. Operate from this perspective and you'll help more people.” —
Jack Butcher

pastInspirations.q: Don't let them drag you down by rumors. Just go with what you believe in.
pastInspirations.h:
“Don't let them drag you down by rumors. Just go with what you believe in.” —
Michael Jordan

pastInspirations.q: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
pastInspirations.h:
“Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.” —
Aristotle

pastInspirations.q: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
pastInspirations.h:
“Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.” —
Mother Teresa

pastInspirations.q: You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
pastInspirations.h:
“You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.” —
Christopher Columbus

pastInspirations.q: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
pastInspirations.h:
“You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.” —
Beverly Sills

pastInspirations.q: I am thankful to all those who said no. It's because of them, I did it myself.
pastInspirations.h:
“I am thankful to all those who said no. It's because of them, I did it myself. ” —
Wayne Dyer

pastInspirations.q: Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.
pastInspirations.h:
“Life is a question and how we live it is our answer.” —
Gary Keller

pastInspirations.q: Don't look for meaning in the words. Listen to the silences.
pastInspirations.h:
“Don't look for meaning in the words. Listen to the silences.” —
Samuel Beckett

pastInspirations.q: Being wrong brings the opportunity for growth.
pastInspirations.h:
“Being wrong brings the opportunity for growth.” —
Mark Manson

pastInspirations.q: The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.
pastInspirations.h:
“The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.” —
Ming-Dao Deng

pastInspirations.q: All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love.
pastInspirations.h:
“All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love.” —
Morihei Ueshiba

pastInspirations.q: Duty makes us do things well, but love makes us do them beautifully.
pastInspirations.h:
“Duty makes us do things well, but love makes us do them beautifully. ” —
Zig Ziglar

pastInspirations.q: Simple words, repeated daily, can change your life.
pastInspirations.h:
“Simple words, repeated daily, can change your life.” —
Maxime Lagace

pastInspirations.q: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
pastInspirations.h:
“One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.” —
Elbert Hubbard

pastInspirations.q: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
pastInspirations.h:
“Every strike brings me closer to the next home run. ” —
Babe Ruth

pastInspirations.q: I have lost friends, some by death...others by sheer inability to cross the street.
pastInspirations.h:
“I have lost friends, some by death...others by sheer inability to cross the street.” —
Virginia Woolf

pastInspirations.q: Patience expands your options. If you insist on immediate gratification, your choices are severely limited.
pastInspirations.h:
“Patience expands your options. If you insist on immediate gratification, your choices are severely limited.” —
Ralph Marston

pastInspirations.q: Time flies whether you are having fun or not.
pastInspirations.h:
“Time flies whether you are having fun or not.” —
Mary Engelbreit

pastInspirations.q: None but ourselves can free our minds.
pastInspirations.h:
“None but ourselves can free our minds.” —
Bob Marley

pastInspirations.q: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
pastInspirations.h:
“Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.” —
Roy T. Bennett

pastInspirations.q: Never say never, because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.
pastInspirations.h:
“Never say never, because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion.” —
Michael Jordan

pastInspirations.q: Throughout this life, you can never be certain of living long enough to take another breath.
pastInspirations.h:
“Throughout this life, you can never be certain of living long enough to take another breath.” —
Huang Po

pastInspirations.q: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
pastInspirations.h:
“Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.” —
Og Mandino

inspirationOfDay.q: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
inspirationOfDay.h:
“Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.” —
Theodore Roosevelt
